channel.title: La Habana on Cubanoticias
channel.description: Recent content in La Habana on Cubanoticias

item.title: New collapse in Old Havana leaves at least one deceased
item.description: Según el periodista independiente Héctor Luis Valdés Cocho, vecinos del lugar afirman hay al menos cuatro fallecidos. (Collage: Vivian Delgado Barceló-Facebook) This Thursday at least two people were injured in a collapse that occurred in Old Havana, as confirmed by the Provincial Government of People’s Power of the Cuban capital. At 9:10 p.m. A wall of a building located on Angeles Street, Monte corner, in the Jesús María Popular Council collapsed.
